items.name: Bruschetta
items.description: Toasted bread topped with diced tomatoes, garlic, and basil.

items.name: Spinach and Artichoke Dip
items.description: Creamy dip with spinach, artichokes, and melted cheese, served with tortilla chips.

items.name: Stuffed Mushrooms
items.description: Mushroom caps stuffed with a savory mixture of herbs, cheese, and breadcrumbs.

items.name: Caesar Salad
items.description: Crisp romaine lettuce, croutons, parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.

items.name: Greek Salad
items.description: Fresh mixed greens, tomatoes, cucumbers, feta cheese, olives, and Greek dressing.

items.name: Caprese Salad
items.description: Slices of fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil, drizzled with balsamic glaze.

items.name: Grilled Salmon
items.description: Grilled salmon fillet served with a lemon butter sauce and steamed vegetables.

items.name: Chicken Alfredo
items.description: Grilled chicken breast served over fettuccine pasta with creamy Alfredo sauce.

items.name: Beef Tenderloin
items.description: Tender beef tenderloin steak served with garlic mashed potatoes and asparagus.

items.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
items.description: Warm chocolate cake with a gooey chocolate center, topped with vanilla ice cream.

items.name: Tiramisu
items.description: Layered Italian dessert made with coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cheese.

items.name: Cheesecake
items.description: Creamy New York-style cheesecake with your choice of fruit topping.
